articles.title: In Geneva, U.S. and Ukraine officials report progress on ending war with Russia - NPR
articles.description: Top U.S. and Ukrainian officials said Sunday they'd made progress toward ending the Russia-Ukraine war but provided scant details after discussing the American proposal to achieve peace.
